channel.title: Im thinking of making a grass tennis court?
channel.description:
Title says all ^^
I did some "research" from google, and I decided I might make a grass tennis court. My parents are thinking about it, and I'm gonna get ready.
I'll post some pics soon, I know many of you aren't too interested in tennis but this might get you into it :D
I will be following this guide: http://www.ehow.com/how_2051395_make-backyard-grass-tennis-court.html
If you have any tips, or guides, please post them here. It'll be appreciated.
Wish me luck :D

item.title: Im thinking of making a grass tennis court?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

It would have to be turf for the ball to bounce, I think?

Read full topic
